example.text: When I ask Big Pharma why they are raising prices on working families, the answer “it’s complicated” is just not good enough. Big drug companies are enriching their wealthy shareholders with stock buybacks rather than cutting costs for Wisconsinites, & I’m having none of it. [[url]]

Always a pleasure to see County Executive [[user]] representing the 414 in DC! I’m proud to be a partner for Milwaukee County as we work together to increase access to affordable mental health care, keep our communities safe, and cut costs for working families. [[url]]

Always a pleasure to see County Executive [[user]] representing the 414 in DC! I’m proud to be a partner for Milwaukee County as we work together to increase access to affordable mental health care, keep our communities safe, and cut costs for working families. [[url]]

When I ask Big Pharma why they are raising prices on working families, the answer “it’s complicated” is just not good enough. Big drug companies are enriching their wealthy shareholders with stock buybacks rather than cutting costs for Wisconsinites, & I’m having none of it. [[url]]
Our bill would eliminate this offshoring incentive. Treating "foreign" corporations that are managed and controlled in the US as domestic corporations.

Big drug companies are ripping off Wisconsinites & they need to be held accountable. That’s why I’m proud my FAIR Drug Pricing Act is advancing in the Senate to make sure drug companies have to explain themselves when they jack up prices on working families & Wisconsin seniors. [[url]]
